titleStmt.title: The frontispiece of the chronological automaton or self-moving ephemeris of ye. celestial motions, &c. Representing ye phaenomena at noon March 30: 1691 / invented and made by Samuel Watson ...
titleStmt.author: Watson, Samuel, of Coventry, watch-maker.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the theater. And sold by Ra. Simpson ... London. And at Coventry by the bookselers and author.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
